Command line interface¶

Once mothertongues is installed, you can run the following commands with either mtd or mothertongues In addition, you may run the mothertongues Flask API/Web application with the run command

mtd.cli.available(*args, **kwargs)¶

Return names of all language configs at specified path

Parameters:path (str) – path to either a txt file with paths to one or more MTD language configuration files or a directory containing MTD language configuration files
mtd.cli.prepare(*args, **kwargs)¶

Prepares all necessary files for Mother Tongues dictionary web app and API

Parameters:language (str) – path to either a txt file with paths to one or more MTD language configuration files or a directory containing MTD language configuration files
mtd.cli.export(*args, **kwargs)¶

Exports Mother Tongues

Parameters:
  • language (str) – path to either a txt file with paths to one or more MTD language configuration files or a directory containing MTD language configuration files
  • export_type (str) – choose type of export: [“raw-json”, “raw-xlsx”, “raw-csv”, “raw-psv”, “raw-tsv”, “raw-html”, “js”, “json”, “web”, “mobile”, “github”]
  • output (str) – choose where output is exported to
